chapter.text: duyuchi viter
Nosyatʹ doshch
Pryvedennya umovy
Rozpodilyayutʹ yikh yak nakazane
Shcho obitsyayetʹsya do vas bezsumnivno prybudete proyty
Denʹ Vyroku ye nemynuchyy
Nezvazhayuchy na doskonalo utvorene nebo
Vy prodovzhuyetesya posperechatysya pravda
Deviating zvidty yavlyayutʹ soboyu deviators
Prykroshchi do falsifiers
U yikh blundering, vony ye povnistyu neuvazhni
Vony dopytuyutʹ Denʹ Vyroku
denʹ vony ye prysutni do vohnyu
Kushtuyutʹ retribution; tse ye yaki vy zvychayno kydaly vyklyk
spravedlyvyy zasluzhyly park ta pruzhyny
Vony otrymuyutʹ yikhni vynahorody Lorda, dlya vony zvychayno buly nabizhni
Ridko zrobyly vony splyatʹ vsya nich
U svitanku, vony molylysya za forgiveness
chastyna yikhnikh hroshey bula vidkladena dlya zhebraka ta needy
zemlya ye povna znakiv dlya tsykh khto ye pevnyy
Ta v mezhakh sebe; vy mozhete pobachyty
U nebesakh ye vashe zabezpechennya, ta vse shcho obitsyayetʹsya do vas
Lordom nebes ta zemli, tse ye takyy virnyy yak toy fakt, shcho vy rozmovlyayete
vy vidznachyly istoriyu Abraham pochesnykh hosti
Vony vidvidaly yoho, kazhuchy, "Myr." Vin skazav, "Myr do vas, neznayomtsiv
Vin poprosyv yoho rodynu pidhotovyty zhyrnu lytku
Koly vin zaproponuvav tse yim, vin zauvazhyv, vy ne hostytesya
Vin harbored strakh z nykh. Vony skazaly, "Ne mayutʹ strakha," ta vony daly harnu novynu knowledgeable syna
Yoho druzhyna bula zdyvovana. Vidznachayuchy yiyi zmorshchyv oblychchya: "YA ye sterylʹna stara zhinka
Vony skazaly, 'Takym "chynom skazaly vashoho Lorda. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Mudryy, Omniscient
Vin skazav, "Shcho vy azh do, O kur'yery
Vony skazaly, "My buly vidpravleni do kryminalʹnykh lyudey
My budemo yim zlyvy z skelyamy hlyny
Vidznachatysya vashym Lordom dlya porushnykiv
My todi dostavyly vsim viruyucham
My ne znayshly u tse krim odnoho budynku submitters
My vstanovlyuyemo tse yak urok dlya tsykh khto bo bolisnoho retribution
U Moses (ye urok). My poslaly yomu Pharaoh z ochevydnymy dokazamy
Ale vin prohnav, u zukhvalosti, ta skazav, "Charivnyk, abo bozhevilʹnyy
Otzhe, my pokaraly yoho ta yoho viysʹko. My kynuly yikh u more, ta vin yavlyaye soboyu osudyty
U `aad (ye urok). My poslaly na nykh z·hubnyy viter
Budʹ shcho shcho tse prybulo na nadzvychayno bulo zruynovane
U Thamoud (ye urok). Vony buly kazani, "Polyublyayutʹ tymchasovo
Vony protydiyaly komandi yikhnʹoho Lorda. Otzhe, blyskavka ukladeni yim tomu shcho vony podyvylysya
Vony mohly nikoly ne vstaty, ne vony dopomohly
Ta lyudy Noah pered shcho; vony buly bezputni lyudy
My skonstruyuvaly nebo z nashymy rukamy, ta my prodovzhymo rozshyryty tse
Ta my zrobyly zemlyu habitable; doskonalyy proekt
My utvoryly paru (muzhchyna ta zhinka) vse, shcho vy mozhete vzyaty uvahu
Vy budete vtikty do BOHA. YA posylayusʹ Yo do vas yak ochevydnykh warner
Ne vstanovlenyy bilya BOHA budʹ-yakyy inshyy boh. YA posylayusʹ Yo do vas yak ochevydnykh warner
Stiyko, koly kur'yer poyikhav do poperednikh heneratsiy, vony skazaly, "Charivnyk," abo, "Bozhevilʹnyy
vony zrobyly dohovir z odyn odnoho? Diysno, vony porushnyky
Vy mozhete disregard yim; vy ne mozhete buty osudzhuvatysya
Ta nahaduyutʹ, dlya reminder vyhod viruyuchi
ya ne stvoryuvav jinns ta humans krim shchob obozhnyuvaty Meni yedynyy
ya ne potrebuyu umov z nykh, ne roblyu ya potrebuyu yikh nahoduvaty Meni
BOH yavlyaye soboyu Provaydera, Possessor vsiyeyi potuzhnosti, Vyshchoyi
porushnyky pidpaly ta zhe dolya yak yikhni poperedni kolehy; vony ne musyatʹ vyklyk
Prykroshchi do tsykh khto disbelieved z dnya shcho ochikuye yikh
